name: Opentracing API
tagline: Common API for distributed tracing and context propagation
body:

## Support or Contact
Open an issue against one of the repositories, or start a discussion in [Distributed Tracing](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/distributed-tracing) Google group.
